title: 3 fee champ gifts to the first person that can...
body:
geuss who my top 5 favorite champs.

Well I goofed but a deal is a deal.  Deep Terror Nami just won.

Maybe next time I'll do least favorites and impose some limitations to make it more fun.

replies.body: Eh, Sona, Tahm, Leona, Taric, Alistar.
you did in fact pick 2 of the 5.  Nice try.
Oh damn you got 4 right!  This may not be as hard as I thought it would be!

How about Zac instead of Varus. Given enough guesses it's just a process of elimination XD. Now if you said we could only guess once every 2 hours this could go on for some time and we'd use other people's guesses to improve ours.
Well next time I'll have to make this more strict because you just won!!  Also maybe I won't be so nice with the hints either :P

If it's acceptable, I'd like to request 650 RP instead of 3 champions, so that I have enough to buy Deep Sea Nami on release. 650 is less than 3 of the cheapest champions. If not, I'll just pass the champion reward to someone else.
love the new FEK avatar Nami!
I can do that.  Now if only my waitress would come back so I could pay and leave this resteraunt...been stuck here for like 25 minutes now with nothing in front of me >.>
Oh god. The "Do this and get a reward thread" might spawn another "Do this and get a bone you needy poor person" thread. The cycle is beginning my brothers!

Well from what your favorite champs so far I see somewhat of a theme
Sona
Tahm
Annie
Nami
and swain because why not

Sona
Annie
Tahm Kench
Dr. Mundo
Zac

Sona
Tahm Kench
Malphite
Caitlyn
Kha'Zix
